items.name: Crane Key
items.description: An old brass key with a crane engraved on its bow. The metal is worn but the craftsmanship is exquisite.

items.name: Square Key
items.description: A heavy iron key with a square-shaped bow. It feels cold to the touch.

items.name: Diamond Key
items.description: A silver key with a diamond-shaped head. It gleams in the light.

items.name: Master Key
items.description: A complex key that looks like it could open many locks. The engravings suggest it's important.

items.name: Medicinal Herb
items.description: A green herb with healing properties. Can restore some health when used.

items.name: First Aid Spray
items.description: A medical spray that can fully restore health. Very valuable.

items.name: Shotgun Shells
items.description: 12-gauge shotgun shells. Powerful but limited capacity.

items.name: Research Notes
items.description: Hastily written notes about the outbreak. The handwriting is frantic.

items.name: Valve Handle
items.description: A metal valve handle. Might be useful for turning on water or gas systems.

items.name: Bolt Cutters
items.description: Heavy-duty bolt cutters. Can cut through chains and padlocks.

items.name: Electrical Fuse
items.description: A replacement fuse. Might restore power to a circuit.
